title: Warsongs not on iTunes
body: So I'm going on a flight tomorrow and was really looking forward to downloading Warsongs on iTunes but it's nowhere to be found. Pretty bummed right now that I may not be able to listen to this tomorrow. Wth riot?

replies.body: Same...can't find it in ITunes store.  Checked Apple Music too, just in case, nothing.  Would really like to download this local to my mobile device to listen to.
There was a bit of a hiccup...oops! - but it is currently on Spotify and soon to be on iTunes.  Stay tuned...
Its also not on google play or spotify :( rito pls
It's a really good album, and i would love to be able to get it on iTunes so I can listen to it anywhere.
I thought it was going to be free? It cost $10 on itunes. I've got the free basic mp3 download but can't put it on my ipod without it coming from itunes. What is going on?

Can download from SoundCloud and import to iTunes
[https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends)

> [{quoted}](name=Yasu Yoru,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hgko7ooE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-16T02:32:27.010+0000)
>
> Can download from SoundCloud and import to iTunes


I can't get songs on my phone without downloading directly from iTunes or deleting my entire library. As such, it would be nice if the songs were on iTunes like, it seems, riot had planned. Thanks anyway, though.
